name: Augustus Pablo
description: '''Horace Michael Swaby''' (21 June 1953 â€“ 18 May 1999), also known as '''Augustus Pablo''', was a Jamaican [[roots reggae]] and [[Dub music|dub]] composer, performer, [[record producer]], and multi-instrumentalist. He was active from the 1970s until his death. He was known for playing the [[melodica]].
